name: go-fish
description: Language-agnostic Go Fish game for language learning
author: Cedar Edwards

scripts.build: yarn workspace @langfish/go-fish-engine run build && yarn workspace @langfish/go-fish-websocket-server-plugin run build && yarn workspace @langfish/go-fish-websocket-client run build && yarn workspace @langfish/go-fish-server run build && yarn workspace @langfish/go-fish-ui run build
